outputs.output_descr:
The Project Preparation Grant is requested to finance the preparation of the CCCD Medium-Size Project "Capacity building for mainstreaming MEA objectives into inter-ministerial structures and mechanisms" in Costa Rica.  Specifically, resources are requested to support the needed consultations among varied key stakeholder representatives, as well as to undertake preliminary studies necessary to organize project activities under the proposed strategy. The objective of the project is to institutionalize decision-making that integrates global environmental with sectorial development priorities.  The strategy is to do so through a robust and resilient inter-ministerial consultative and decision-making process, building upon existing similar structures in Costa Rica. 
The key outcome of the stage will be a fully developed medium-size project document compliant with GEF and UNDP submission requirements

project_descr: Capacity building for mainstreaming MEA objectives into inter-ministerial structures and mechanisms
